requirements.summary: Remove the temporary "Test Signup Page" CTA from the Landing hero actions while keeping the remaining hero buttons intact and the page free of unused imports.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx` no longer renders the "Test Signup Page" button/link to `/signup-test`.
Landing page builds cleanly with no unused imports (e.g., remove `TestTube2` if it becomes unused).
All remaining Landing page buttons (Start Climbing, Continue Climbing, Why SweetSteps?) continue to function and render correctly.

file_operations.description: Remove the hero action Link/Button that navigates to `/signup-test` ("Test Signup Page") and clean up any now-unused imports (notably `TestTube2`). Ensure existing shadcn-ui `Button`/`Card` usage remains unchanged for the remaining CTAs and modal (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
